title: Nice interface and best audio call quality

text: Minimalistic, beautiful, robust and excellent audio quality. Needs a bit of getting used to, but it's pretty user intuitive. Definitely more stable than Skype and as solid as whatsapp. Loving it!
title: Minimalistic & Stable

text: After weeks of waiting for better design, with this last update I'm finally deleting the app and taking all my friends with me until you start feeding your designer again. The performance of the messenger is far worse than others, but the only thing that kept me using it was its design and sounds. Now when it's grotesque and egocentric, nothing else holds me.
title: Return to initial design

text:
Wire is an amazing alternative to Skype, and sorry to say they have done way better than the app developers over at Skype has done.

Wire is an awesome application, but it could use some work. Simply by fixing small bugs, etc.

The interface is so beautiful. I feel like it's just a picture perfect app just like the name.
title: Astonishingly beautiful. Powerful. Perfect.

text: Sleek, beautiful, effective!
title: Amazing!

text:
I like this app.
It's different, quite fast and fun to use.
But first of all it doesn't give u much choice of customization, u know like chat backgrounds or alert tones. Second, it's  not easy and fast to put inputs. I prefer to choose emojis myself and when u switch to emoji keyboard u don't have the send key anymore! I know simple is elegant, but needs refinements.
title: Very good but needs work

text:
First of all the reason why my girlfriend and I started using this app was because we fell in love with the black theme.
Hands down the best looking messaging app on the store.
However the theme has been changed to white, kindly bring back the option to switch between black and white theme.

Now coming to the second change. That is a must.
There is no option to go through all the media that's been shared between two contacts.
I have to scroll through my messages to see the images that were shared instead of finding them all together in a specific place.
title: Two improvements desperately needed.

text: Please bring back the dark theme.
title: Dark theme?

text: I love the simplistic modern look of the app, some flaws are: not easy to navigate around the app from a beginner's perspective, I think allowing ppl to make usernames would make it easier to share via social media platforms & get friends to join easier as well. Also having a dedicated menu button with a link for contacts/friends would be cool too.
title: Beautiful app but needs more

text: The new white backgrounds on iOS 9 are bright on the eyes, please add option to change background!!!
title: Great for all messaging

text: Beautiful app, especially for sharing photos and of course GIFS!
title: Lovely!

text: Beautiful design, tons of fun features (sketching, in-app music, GIFs) and now group calling!
title: Amazing messaging app

text: New group calling feature is unlike anything else on the market. My favorite messaging app, keep the updates coming!
title: Beautifully Simple

text: I love this app for keeping in touch with friends and family. The audio quality is outstanding and now that group calling is possible, making arrangements for girls' nights, outdoor adventures or college roomie catchups is nice and simple.
title: Love the group chat and calling features!

text: This app is great. Super sleek & simple design. You can text, draw, send pics etc. You can even type in a word and the app will find a gif that matched that word for you! You can also "ping" the other person to get their attention. I love it. 10/10
title: Beats all other messaging apps

text: Absolutely funnest text app.
title: Wire text app

text: Excellent !!my hubby and I love it! We enjoy communicating by wire!!! :)
title: Wire

text: If you are looking for a good instant messaging chat and phone calls with no data collection and good encryption and very fun way to interact, then Wire is the right choice. It needs lots of work of course but the team is dedicated and they are doing good job. I dumped all other chat and phone apps and now am just sticking with Wire.
title: Safe, easy, creative

text: This app is perfect for keeping in touch with family plus it sure is beautifully designed. The call quality is impressive - crystal clear! Sharing photos is super easy and we have a great time with GIFs and Sketch. Loving the frequent updates - it keeps getting better and better. Looking forward to seeing what's next.
title: Beautiful messaging app!
